resources.string:
This application checks the security of your WiFi network. Its sole purpose is to show that with a simple click the security of your wifi network is compromised, so that you realize you should not have a default key. 

It is forbidden the use of Auditfi to get the key from a router other than your own. We are not responsible for any misuse that can be given to this application. 

If you do not agree to the terms, you click Exit.
Click search networks to start looking for YOUR network. Make sure you have WiFi enabled.
The password is copied to portapales.
